notes: Client-editable mapping of detected technologies/areas to HubSpot recommendations. Edit byTechnology and byCategory only (no numeric IDs). Product lineup aligns to HubSpot hubs: Marketing, Sales, Service, Content, Data, Commerce. Priorities: high/medium/low.

WordPress.title: Migrate from WordPress to HubSpot Content Hub
WordPress.reason: Move your website onto HubSpot for CRM-connected content, SEO tooling, lead capture, and unified reporting across the customer journey.
WordPress.inboxOffer: Website migration + custom modules + landing pages + SEO optimization

WordPress.com.title: Evaluate moving from WordPress.com to HubSpot Content Hub
WordPress.com.reason: HubSpot unifies website management with marketing automation and CRM data for personalization and lifecycle reporting.
